sentence.Network_en: They have maintained their optimism in the face of desolating subjugation.
sentence.Network_cn: 面对遭征服的悲惨命运，他们保持了乐观的态度。

sentence.Network_en: In the interview he gave some grounds for optimism.
sentence.Network_cn: 他接受采访时阐述了持乐观态度的理由。

sentence.Network_en: Every day of sunshine strengthens the feelings of optimism.
sentence.Network_cn: 每天晒太阳让人心情更加开朗。

PerfectNetExp.abs: “O”代表乐观(Optimism)，与人们以往认为的不同，我们提倡的现实、灵活的乐观不应该只是一种自我陶醉，或者不切实际的自我膨胀。

his music conveys a sense of optimism ., 他的音乐表达出一种乐观情绪.

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 18th cent.: from French optimisme, from Latin optimum 'best thing' (see optimum)

entry.def: Optimism is the feeling of being hopeful about the future or about the success of something in particular.

example.ex: The Indian Prime Minister has expressed optimism about India's future relations with the USA.
example.tran: 印度总理对未来的印美关系表示乐观。

means.word_mean: 1. the optimistic feeling that all is going to turn out well
2. a general disposition to expect the best in all things

auth_sentence.content: There's a lot of optimism around the place.
auth_sentence.res_content: There's a lot of optimism around the place.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: There's a lot of optimism around the place.

auth_sentence.content: But many in the airline industry expressed cautious optimism.
auth_sentence.res_content: But many in the airline industry expressed cautious optimism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But many in the airline industry expressed cautious optimism.

auth_sentence.content: They greeted the news from Geneva with guarded optimism.
auth_sentence.res_content: They greeted the news from Geneva with guarded optimism.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They greeted the news from Geneva with guarded optimism.

stems_affixes.word_buile: optim最好,乐观+al……的→adj.最佳的, 最理想的
optimist[n.乐天派, 乐观者]+ic……的→adj.乐观主义的
optim最好,乐观+um表示场地→adj.最适宜的 n.最适宜[条件]
optim最好,乐观+ism主义→n.乐观,乐观主义
optim最好,乐观+ist人→n.乐天派, 乐观者
optim最好,乐观+um表示场地→adj.最适宜的 n.最适宜[条件]

Sentence.sentence: They resonated(共鸣) with optimism and ambition in much the same way as the most famous dream speech of all, delivered by Martin Luther King Jr
They can only be solved by people with optimism and ambition.

sentences.en: Optimism made him alive through the hard days.
sentences.cn: 乐观主义使他在艰难的岁月里活了下来。

jushi.english: Both parties expressed optimism about an eventual solution.
jushi.chinese: 双方对问题的最终解决都表示乐观。

jushi.english: Optimism made him alive through the hard days.
jushi.chinese: 乐观主义使他在艰难的岁月里活了下来。
